Package com.common

Interface BarrelInt

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
Barrel
public interface BarrelInt extends Remote
The remote interface for Barrel objects. Specifies the methods that can be invoked remotely on a Barrel.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    alive()
    Notifies the Barrel that it is still alive.
    boolean
    indexedUrl(String url)
    Checks if a URL has been indexed by the Barrel.
    Site[]
    linkedPages(String url)
    Retrieves the linked pages for a given URL.
    Site[]
    search(String[] words, int page)
    Searches for sites containing the specified words.

  • Method Details

    • indexedUrl

      boolean indexedUrl(String url) throws RemoteException
      Checks if a URL has been indexed by the Barrel.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL to check.
      Returns:
      True if the URL is indexed, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote error occurs.

    • search

      Site[] search(String[] words, int page) throws RemoteException
      Searches for sites containing the specified words.
      Parameters:
      words - The words to search for.
      page - The page number of results to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An array of Site objects matching the search criteria.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote error occurs.

    • linkedPages

      Site[] linkedPages(String url) throws RemoteException
      Retrieves the linked pages for a given URL.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL for which linked pages are requested.
      Returns:
      An array of Site objects representing linked pages.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote error occurs.

    • alive

      void alive() throws RemoteException
      Notifies the Barrel that it is still alive.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote error occurs.
